website_summaries.verdict: Low-profile design for a well-priced freshwater reel that will make it easier to operate.
pros: Many anglers will appreciate the way this low-profile reel with a recessed reel foot will fit the fishing rod
Specializes in allowing you to cast accurately
Features a lot of brass in the design to ensure it'll give you a nice longevity
Priced at a good level for this style of reel
cons: Doesn't work as well for those seeking larger fish, as the drag may not hold up well

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing reel.
customer_reviews.text: I'm relatively new to fishing, and this type of reel requires a bit of skill. In other words, there's a learning curve. But once you have it figured out, it's well worth the small amount of effort required to get it right. The two different cast-drag settings, one on either side, are easy to maneuver, and the idea is that you set it for your own style of casting. I paid $40 for this reel. You can pay much more for baitcasting reel, but in my opinion, you don't need to. I paired mine with a 7' medium-heavy Ugly Stik rod. It is now my go-to reel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love this reel!
customer_reviews.text: Love this reel! This is my first baitcaster and I've had an extremely easy time getting used to it. I've always heard baitcaster reels were difficult to get used to but I've had zero birds nests and it's second hand nature casting with this reel now. The drag, tension, and break mechanisms are easy and fast to adjust. I have it on a 7ft gx2 ugly stik medium heavy with 30lb power pro braided line.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Like any baitcaster reel
customer_reviews.text: Like any baitcaster reel, this took some getting used to and plenty of practice. But by the end of the day, I was comfortable putting my lures where I wanted them. Watch a few Youtube videos before you go casting; it will save you a lot of frustration. Be prepared to untangle a few snags on your first day out.
customer_reviews.author: bearmedic

customer_reviews.title: Good Reel for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am a fair weather fisherman and not the hardcore type. This reel is not the Old Abu Garcia quality reels I remember in my younger days but so far it is working well and I have no complaints. Pretty Good Product for the Price but I'm reserving my 5 stars for those old school Abu Garcia Reels.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Guy Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the real,good price,fast delivery,
customer_reviews.text: for the money I did not expect much,I am giving huge satisfation for this product,a quick comment I think is important,I have spent the last 10 years caring for my wife,her spine was held together with hardware,I lost her to cancer almost 1 year ago ,my fishing gear was lost,stolen,etc.fishing is important to me as its theriputic,finances are tight,I am almost 59 years old,this real is my favorite,easy to dial in for smooth casts,and in my personal life the last thing I need is stress wich is possible with baitcasters,this reel has been tremendous,I will purchase a few more as I am able to afford them,I use lefthanded reels, its just easier to use.can't say enough for this one.
customer_reviews.author: prs

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Bought left and right versions to make sure I would get used to this. Followed the instructions, seen a bunch of reviews and got a good 1st throw. If you put a little more strength on the throw, the line creates a nest which is near impossible to fix on location. Definitely not a beginner reel.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Best Baitcaster for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great reel. For the price, you won't find anything better. Thing runs like a champ. I use it for saltwater mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like the Abu Garcia Black Max Low Profile Reel?
customer_reviews.text: This review should be five stars...but...for the second time this year, the “ line release” feature of the Abu Garcia Black Max Low Profile reel is broken. Worse, part of the metal release feature broke off. So two reels with the same issue? When the first one went down I thought maybe I had done something to cause it to break. But today, I was simply going to make a cast and upon pushing the line release feature, part of the metal release mechanism simply fell off. So disappointed. Come on Abu Garcia, you can do better.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Decent reel with a couple very minor negatives.
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything on this inexpensive reel yet capable reel. You really cant go wrong at all for $40. However......I didn't like the fact there are NO click-stops on the star drag at all , and NO click-stops on the spool tensioner at all. Both are very minor issues that are really nit picking. I returned mine because of this as my other casting reel has it and only cost $34 , yet for many it wont be an issue. I found that I got a little more "Bang-For-The-Buck" with a Piscifun Torrent reel and a slightly better review.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough that would give this reel it's due, I didn't know how to use a baitcaster before this reel. it showed me how to use a baitcaster without all the birds nests. now I'm able to use a different baitcaster with a little more difficulty, and I know this reel with only help if I keep practicing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Retro Game enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Nice begginers reel
customer_reviews.text: This is my first baitcasting reel, smooth and easy to cast, the only thing I don't like it's the construction, way too much plastic in it's structure, I won't dare to call it sturdy. I bought it refurbished it came in pristine condition, no complains at all.
customer_reviews.author: dhyslop

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Left handed version
customer_reviews.text: This is my first baitcaster. Little learning curve as far as avoiding the birds nest upon casting but I cant blame that on the reel. The quality of the reel surpassed my expectations, especially for the price. I bought the right handed one first and was passing the rod into my left hand to reel in after each cast...I returned it and bought the left handed version which was a complete game changer. Highly recommend buying the left handed version from the get go. Im considering buying another one once Ive mastered casting the baitcaster. My rod is a 7 foot medium heavy Berkly Cherrywood HD. Line is 10lb fluro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent reel, using it with 50lb braid line and have no backlashing issues unless it's completely my fault. Drag system works great. Level wind is sturdy. Feels good to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel for $40
customer_reviews.text: You can crank this thing a mile once you get the brakes to your personal setting. Great reel for the low price point however can feel the difference between this and the $100+ reels if you already own. Great one to start with if you've never used a baitcaster before!
customer_reviews.author: Bmurphy1

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable reel for the money. I have a lot of mid to high end reels and so far this reel works just as well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Don-WWF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This reel is awesome! I love the sleek style of this bait casting reel. Not only does it look awesome, but it's super smooth and very comfortable to fish with. I would recommend this reel to anyone who is interested in an affordable and effective bait caster. Also, top notch service. Thanks for your hard work guys.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a Daiwa Fuego at the same time. They are both very good reels for the money, and the Daiwa is slightly better...but only slightly, and its quite a bit more $. If you need a good solid reel for a good price get this reel. you won't be sorry. Also, if you're right handed consider a left handed reel...its a pro way to go as you don't have to switch from cast hand to retrieve hand.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: If you receive it in plastic clamshell package, inspect the reel.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Abu Garcia Bmax3-left And upon unpacking it I found out it is missing the spool tension knob, I believe part# 1302712. Hate to have to return it for such a minor issue but I’m not buying a $6-$8 part for a brand new reel. However I have used this bait caster before and it’s a great little reel for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bait caster. I wish it came with instructions on how to use. But after a few videos and reading up on how to set it up I figured out all the settings. I don’t have any experience with other bait casters but I think this is a great reel.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Hope this helps
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this baitcaster especially for the price. This was a great reel and it is very smooth. Setting the real up was really easy and if you are have struggles there is plenty of videos online. It's is probably a better lake fishing real then a river reel but that's the truth for most baitcasters. Overall this product looked very sleek and has a very high build quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Shupe

customer_reviews.title: One of the best under $100!!!
customer_reviews.text: This reel surpassed my expectations in every way! I was hoping to get a budget reel that would meet my fishing needs, but this reel is smoother and built better than some $100 baitcasters! I would challenge anyone to find a better dollar for dollar deal on a baitcaster.
customer_reviews.author: Drew E.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Takes some time to get used to casting, but it throws far and smooth. I already love this rod, comfortable even with a rod without a finger index point.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money and get something nicer - previous reviewers are right that buying a higher quality model will alleviate the frustration with constant adjustments necessary in this Abu reel.
customer_reviews.author: docgoat

customer_reviews.title: Abu Garcia reels
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff no complaints on my part the only reason the I order this reel because the one the came with the rod was right hand side so I replaced with left hand reel other than that it’s very good reel I recommend it easy to setup it’s good for the money
customer_reviews.author: J Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great starter reel
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to buy his own bait cast reel and rod with some birthday money. He read reviews on this reel and decided this was the one that he wanted. So far he has not been disappointed. It is very smooth and I don't anticipate him having any problems
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I was just getting used to frequent backlashes and thought I must suck at baitcasting. I was settling for wimpy casts with either the brakes set at max or not using the leverage of the rod tip to cast the line out. Then I invested in a more quality set up - (Lew's Mach Crush Combo), spooled it with the exact same line (30 lb braid to fluorocarbon leader) and MAGIC! all the backlashes disappeared!!! I still use the Black Max but I have to get the brakes EXACTLY right for the weight of the lure and even then... backlashes happen but just not as much. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. INVEST IN A HIGHER QUALITY SET UP!
customer_reviews.author: 46YF

customer_reviews.title: Never buy reels from warehouse deals
customer_reviews.text: This is a good reel for the money. I base my opinion on the one I used a friend had let me borrow. The one I bought and received from warehouse deals was a smashed piece of garbage. The sticker said “Inspected”? Yeah by Helen Keller
customer_reviews.author: Sc33

customer_reviews.title: Excellent real for beginners and Anyone wanting a light weight real.
customer_reviews.text: Received this well packaged no damage. Can’t wait for opening day of fishing. Haven’t loaded line on it yet due to below freezing temps here so to get the backyard check out I’ll need to wait for spring. Recommend this real to not only beginners middle of the road fisherman as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: excellent reel
customer_reviews.text: more sensitive to dial in the tension and breaks then i first thought however once aligned, the reel works like a champ. smooth on release, light in the hands, and the take up is quick and even. good reel for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: axmsw

customer_reviews.title: Black Max
customer_reviews.text: Took my Black Max out for the first time on the 4th July and it preformed well, didn’t have no problem casting very little backlash. Setting your tension for every lure you use is important, some lures you don’t have to but it’s best to check.
customer_reviews.author: N. Burwell

customer_reviews.title: Loved the first one so much, bought a second for my Ugly Stick
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first one so much, bought a second for my Ugly Stick. Once you get it tuned for your weight, these are as easy as casting Zebco 33s. I can't get over how awesome these are for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Spindler

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is new to fishing....
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is new to fishing and he is absolutely obsessed with it. He wanted a second reel and this one in particular!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. spencer

customer_reviews.title: The reel is smoother than your pick up lines......
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with it is the handle seems a bit small, like the circle made while reeling is too small. I'll proble get a new handle for it. The reel made me happy enough to buy a new rod for it rather than switching reels to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: I love this reel!
customer_reviews.text: Great reel. Great price. If you're searching for an inexpensive reel or are just learning, I highly recommend the Black max. I liked it so much I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the low price point.
customer_reviews.text: You can crank this thing a mile once you get the brakes to your personal setting. Great reel for the low price point. Great one to start with if you've never used a bait caster before!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. who

customer_reviews.title: Good performance at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, took a bit to get everything adjusted out for max range on casts, but performed well. Especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: This product is great quality and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So I'm kind of obsessed with fishing I'm on the water 3 to 5 days out of the week. This reel has a great casting ability . I do a lot of bass fishing with multiple lures. It is easy adjust. An my line does not get caught up which is very important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the money, pretty much a "go to" reel in my boat. I own 4 now and havent had any issues. I also own more expensive reels that cast better but have had a few issues with them over the years but these just keep on catching fish!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rougee

customer_reviews.title: Very Good but it has a real disappointment
customer_reviews.text: the product is excellent, it is of very good quality and the shipping time was as expected, however I made the purchase for the left hand, the product in the description claims to be for the left hand but when I opened the box I was surprised that it is For right hand, and I have received it in Costa Rica, I could not return it without having to assume very high shipping costs. It has been a real disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Williams CR

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little reel. Paired it with a 6’6” ugly stik and does a great job with Reds, flounder and bass. Magnetic brake works great. Smooth casting, whether I am using a light lure or using a 1 ounce rig fishing with live bait. The only drawback I have found is that it needs to be thoroughly washed and oiled after every use. Not that big of a deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my 11 yo son for his birthday and he is able to cast it easily. It has settings so it can be set ...
customer_reviews.text: It works just as well as the $100 reel I have. (one of the Johnny Morris Pro qualifier). I bought it for my 11 yo son for his birthday and he is able to cast it easily. It has settings so it can be set to lessen the likelihood of a bird's nest when being used by someone that is learning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice - worth much more than I paid for it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great reel. Purchased as a back up and has performed flawlessly. Easy to adjust and casts as well as my much more expensive reel. A great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Will Zytka

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: After catching literally 2 fish the drag just gave out, at no matter what I do to tweak it every time a fish was on the drag just gave out.
customer_reviews.author: Cody V.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good reel
customer_reviews.text: Great little reel. Affordable and easy to use. Not as low of a profile as say the Revo X, but a great alternative if you don’t want to spend that extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Clay O.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t understand.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t see what all the hype about this reel is. It’s nothing special for the price. Works. No better then any other inexpensive name brand reel I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: FnH

customer_reviews.title: Left hand reels aren’t just for left hand fisherman
customer_reviews.text: My review is a mid grade reel that works just fine I didn’t want to keep switching hands after every cast so I went with a left hand retrieving reel.its the only way to go!
customer_reviews.author: TEC Man 2000

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the best reel for the money it is so smooth and light weight, I just love it bought one at Walmart just because it was cheap and I needed an extra reel but since I used it I just love it and so I bought another one and probably will get another, really nice reel
customer_reviews.author: Essel J.

customer_reviews.title: Great intro baitcasting reel
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with an Ugly Stick GX2 and man what an affordable, quality combo. This was a great introduction to baitcaster reels.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R.

customer_reviews.title: If you've never used a bait caster before READ THIS REGARDING LEFT vs. RIGHT HANDED MODELS!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, First, the reel is fabulous. But, as a person who had never used a bait caster before, I assumed that since I use a right handed spinning reel (meaning you crank it with the LEFT hand an hold the pole with the right) that I needed a RIGHT HANDED BAITCASTER...BUT THIS IS NOT THE CASE. If you prefer cranking with your left hand and holding the pole with your right, then you need a LEFT HANDED BAITCASTER!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing reel for under $60
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the price. If you’re trying to build a decent bait casting set up on a budget this is definitely the reel to get. I have 50/12 lb braided spider wire on mine and it casts amazing. Any negative backlash or bird nest comments are user error don’t let that turn you away lmao. Super light as well. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good reel
customer_reviews.text: Really good feel for the the money. I’ve had this real for a year now and it still works great. Cheaper in price but great for learning I’d buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peeples

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works best for pitchin with a shorter rod. Really floats some jigs. Consistent 40 yd casts. Hard to get any further than that though.
customer_reviews.author: Chastyfreeze

customer_reviews.title: Great baitcaster for a beginner and overall.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't fished in 15yrs. Spinning reels have been my go to all my life. Decided to make a change with this baitcaster. Overall a good baitcaster. Great for beginners as well. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Right hand crank
customer_reviews.text: My first bait caster. Wish I bought a left handed crank. I am right handed, all my spinning reels are left hand crank. This reel is a right hand crank. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and quality:))
customer_reviews.text: This is indeed the best baitcaster I’ve try,casting and retrieving the line is easy if you setup the correct settings of the brake and gear,Abu Garcia is my choice for the smooth baitcaster which I can never switch to other Brand’s thanks:))
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Bought it for a friend and he says it works really well and it is very good for fishing
customer_reviews.author: Bubbly Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just starting out with my first baitcasting reel. This is a great purchase for the money. I'm going to upgrade to a nicer, higher quality/better bearing reel, but this one will remain in my arsenal as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good reel for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good reel. Caught my limit legal size bass (14 inches +) and a few rock wrasse on first trip. Very smooth, with proper tuning. It will never bird nest. Will update review after a few more trip.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Misleading discription
customer_reviews.text: Picture clearly shows a right handed reel. In the discription it dies not state a left handed reel. Highly dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the price much smoother then my Lew american hero also I have 50 pound braid and use on my frog rod
customer_reviews.author: handyman831

customer_reviews.title: Ask for a box! Great wheel!
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, same as the photos, very light, small and seems to be nice. I haven't fish with it yet, but as soom as possible I'll update my review. Just a tip: When you order it, ask for an Amazon Box because mine came in only a Abu Garcia box and it was open, without any seal, so anyone could open and handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Don’t regret it one bit...
customer_reviews.text: First bait caster ever!!! I put it on a 7’ entsport med/hvy option and its fire... I love it so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daye kondenar

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these. They fish well and the price is great. I have caught a lot of nice bass so far and they are easy to take apart so maintenance should be pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tmg033000

customer_reviews.title: Great Jigging Reels
customer_reviews.text: I love these reels for jigging, Not so much for casting. But a good solid jigging reel for walleye or smallmouth bass.
customer_reviews.author: Catfish

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the price. Could benefit from a more refined braking system to reduce backlashing but other than that its a great reel. Very smooth, light and tight feeling.
customer_reviews.author: sarah del paine

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners bait casting reel
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth operation. Great for beginners first bait caster. I really like the ease of use. And if you do get backlash you can easily remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Touchtone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first baitcaster
customer_reviews.text: First baitcaster, and it’s so simple to use! Lightweight and smooth casting.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hash

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. Well built. I just couldn’t figure out to keep from rats nesting each cast.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good reel
customer_reviews.text: Casts smooth and the drag has held up so far after pulling in a few stripers around 13-16lbs
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bovard

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner low pro Baitcasting reel
customer_reviews.text: Great first time Baitcasting reel .. got it on sale for 26.88 and the next day it went up to current price. Wish I would have gotten 2. The only thing I dislike about this reel is that the paint easily comes off with little wear. Not upsetting enough to drop a star because the performance was exactly what I expected. I've since picked up the Max Pro, it's like double the price but to me, the exact same reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: Great for me, I’m used to reeling in left handed so it makes it easier for me to use
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Great for bass.
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel. But in my opinion it is not for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: b.johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive reel!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, make sure you educate yourself on using this reel plenty of you tube videos out there..this will assure that you have a pleasant outcome with operating the reel perfectly... very cool stuff
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: Good starter reel
customer_reviews.text: Haven't backcasted it once! That alone is worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Test Equipment Vendor

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: First time owner of a batecaster. Well I was very impressed even for a $40.00 reel. After a few cast and how to videos picked it up right away. Very smooth and light weight reel. I’ll be buying more in the future. The very next day I caught a smallmouth 13in 3 1/2 lb bass very impressed for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey David Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck beginner reel
customer_reviews.text: Great product all around. Used it for the first time this morning. Read multiple reviews on which baitcaster to get for beginners and this one popped up numerous times. So I pulled the trigger on buying it. And I have to say I'm pretty impressed. It will take some getting used to going from spinning to baitcasting though!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Killen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use the roller bearing is giving out and the drag is slipping.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. After a month of use it hasn’t shown any wear or tear. Doesn’t stand up to my Mach 2 lews reel for casting distance but that’s expected. Backlashes are forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those guys that likes to go fishing every once in a while. However when I do equipment is important. Knowing how to use what you have is key. I watched videos too help me out. Works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. ROB

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first baitcaster. It's so easy to use. I love it more than my spinning reels. I've already caught a lot of fish with it. I'm buying 2 more just lime it.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Carstens

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice reel unfortunately had to send back missing a part.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic for beginners
customer_reviews.text: love the ease of use, performance, and top value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of the reels i have and love them. They perform great and at a price the you can afford
customer_reviews.author: fred dowty

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This reel works great. I have nothing but good things to say about all abu garcia product.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin D Snyder Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great reel..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect reel to lot for light to medium freshwater.. on my first day I snagged a couple of bass took some getting used to to get the lure weight ratio correct ..but now it works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: DonCee

customer_reviews.title: Good reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: Needed a inexpensive reel for a back up rod. Work so well I used it several days jerking spools with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: smooth like warm butter casts 10 feet farther than my high end reel
customer_reviews.author: ron prince

customer_reviews.title: Wow, who knew.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleek new design. Can’t wait to get out on the water and try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Wilton

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent! Best bang for buck bait caster out there
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent! Best bang for buck bait caster out there
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Abu Garcia Black Max
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reel. If you want to learn how to fish with a bait caster, This is a great reel to learn with nice quality product. You cannot beat this reel.
customer_reviews.author: Rychemind

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Round two: I like the low profile in my hand can’t wait to fish it! Exceptional value and on a great reel. Buy one before they are all gone!
customer_reviews.author: standswithconcern

customer_reviews.title: Cast's far and light and price!
customer_reviews.text: Backlash at the beginning messed with controls got better and better good real 👌 fishing buzzbaits crainkbaits jigs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kraig Kryger

customer_reviews.title: Great reel great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This reel is awesome absolutely love it... i also have a Shimano 151 SLX I prefer the AlbuGracia. It is just such a sweet reel for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hall

customer_reviews.title: Better then lews
customer_reviews.text: Black Max is my one and only Rod and Reel combo I use.
customer_reviews.author: Droops DeAlba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price. I bought it for flipping heavy jigs into cover,and so far I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: make sure everything works before spooling line on it.
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a bad review for now because it was missing parts an the line guide will not move back an forth on the track.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good reel
customer_reviews.text: Liked it bought two one for my son and one for me put 12 lb line and went Striper fishing no problems good deal for the price, got it a little bit longer waiting for the mail this was my last purchase since I didn't know their 2A policy but the reel is good
customer_reviews.author: Colburn Sui

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just great! Works for what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: 51up

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel. Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the money, even if I did find the same one at Walmart for ten bucks less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casts FAR
customer_reviews.text: What a great reel for a little money, love both that I own
customer_reviews.author: TC

product_meta.title: Abu Garcia Black Max Low Profile Baitcasting Fishing Reel
feature_bullets: Lightweight design with one piece graphite frame and side plates
MagTrax brake system boosts range and accuracy of casts
Compact bent handle and recessed reel provide an ergonomic grip
